body:
Hi,

I wrote a [skeleton package](https://github.com/GjjvdBurg/NumPy_C_Extension) that links a C library to Python using Cython and NumPy. Compilation worked fine for Cython version 0.27.3 but doesn't work anymore for version 0.28.x. I posted this issue [on StackOverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/q/51099630/) and it was suggested that this might be a problem with Cython, so I'm reporting it here. Steps to reproduce are in the SO post, but to reiterate:

### 0.27.3 Environment

```bash
virtualenv -p python3.6 old
cd old
source bin/activate
pip install cython==0.27.3 numpy==1.13.3
git clone https://github.com/GjjvdBurg/NumPy_C_Extension
cd NumPy_C_Extension
rm src/cython_wrapper.c
python setup.py build_ext -i
# Compilation proceeds without errors
```

### 0.28.3 Environment

```bash
virtualenv -p python3.6 new
cd new
source bin/activate
pip install cython==0.28.3 numpy==1.14.5
git clone https://github.com/GjjvdBurg/NumPy_C_Extension
cd NumPy_C_Extension
rm src/cython_wrapper.c
python setup.py build_ext -i
# Compilation fails
```

Thanks for your time!
title: Potential regression for NumPy Cython extension
